definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: He is a Re Xinchang who likes to help others.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個熱心腸的人，喜歡幫助別人。

sentences.english: Swiss people are kind, warm hearted.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士人民很友好和熱心腸。

sentences.english: Such is the boy, a warm-hearted child who is always ready to help others.
sentences.chinese: 這個孩子就是這樣一個熱心腸的人，總是樂於助人。

sentences.english: My friend Jack is really a warmhearted person.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友傑克真的是個熱心腸的人。

sentences.english: Your bleeding heart should be more wary?I have a bad feeling about him.
sentences.chinese: 你的熱心腸是否應該警惕些？我對他有很不好的感覺。

sentences.english: The new conductor, Andrew, is a handsome and warm-hearted young man.
sentences.chinese: 新來的售票員安德魯是個熱心腸的帥小夥。

sentences.english: Her letter conveys that she has a warm heart.
sentences.chinese: 他的信表達了他有一顆熱心腸。

sentences.english: And the pro - Ma Shasha also answer will be warm - hearted person to carry forward the spirit of the network.
sentences.chinese: 親和的馬莎莎也有問必答，將熱心腸精神發揚至網絡。

sentences.english: She was a warmhearted, generous old lady.
sentences.chinese: 她是一位熱心腸的，慷慨的老太太。

sentences.english: A real woman… a gentle, warmhearted and supportive person.
sentences.chinese: 一個溫和的，熱心腸的和支持的人。

sentences.english: I think the little girl was, though very young, a very warm-hearted person.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得這個小女孩雖然年輕，但是一個很熱心腸的人。
他們是熱心腸的正常人。

sentences.english: Most VIPs I've known are authentic people.
sentences.chinese: 我認識的大多數“熱心腸”都很真實。
